alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 2:12PM CDT until April 20 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Benton County in northwestern Arkansas... Northwestern Carroll County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 212 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northwest of War Eagle, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Rogers... Eureka Springs... Beaver... War Eagle... Hobbs State Park... Grandview... Beaver Lake... Walnut Hill... Monte Ne... Larue... Pleasant Ridge... Lookout... Oak Hill... Busch... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
